author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: The Martian: Responses on Twitter
text:
The sci-fi adventure movie The Martian opened to rave reviews around the globe.
Know what the moviegoers said about the film on Twitter.
Positive tweets
The movie was actually good, but of course everyone would agree the book is a whole different beast. #TheMartian
‚Äî Jus (@juscamarena) October 3, 2015 There's no better suspenseful drama about scientists and engineers making miracles happen set to a disco soundtrack than #TheMartian .
‚Äî Jesse - The Fan Man (@LilTooClinical) October 3, 2015 @MartianMovie was SO GOOD! Definitely did @andyweirauthor 's amazing book the justice it deserves & #MattDamon nailed #MarkWaney ! #TheMartian
‚Äî shorttripp86 (@ShortTripp86) October 3, 2015 Just saw "The Martian." Really good (and long) movie. Cool scenes of Mars and Damon's character was funny!. #TheMartian @MartianMovie
‚Äî francesco marano (@italianmojo887) October 3, 2015
Funny tweets
#TheMartian teach us how to survive on Mars with tape, science and potatoes üçü
‚Äî Karl Eornost F√∂jel (@EornostFojel) October 3, 2015 #TheMartian is what would happen if Will Hunting went to school in a good neighborhood, never meet Robin Williams and then joined NASA
‚Äî Gillian Frew (@gillianfrew) October 3, 2015 Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
